member.name: IShellIconOverlayManager.GetFileOverlayInfo
member.summary: Gets the index of the icon overlay or the icon image for the specified file with the specified attributes.
member.param: The full path of the file.
The attributes of the file. This parameter can be a combination of any of the file attribute flags (FILE_ATTRIBUTE_*) defined in the Windows header files. See File Attribute Constants.
A pointer to the icon index in the system image list.
For the index of the icon overlay, use SIOM_OVERLAYINDEX. For the index of the icon image, use SIOM_ICONINDEX.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: IShellIconOverlayManager.GetReservedOverlayInfo
member.summary: Gets the index of the icon overlay or the icon image for the specified file with the specified attributes from one of the reserved overlays.
member.param: The full path of the file.
The attributes of the file. This parameter can be a combination of any of the file attribute flags (FILE_ATTRIBUTE_*) defined in the Windows header files. See File Attribute Constants.
The index of the icon image or icon overlay, depending on the value of dwflags.
For the index of the icon overlay, use SIOM_OVERLAYINDEX. For the index of the icon image, use SIOM_ICONINDEX.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: IShellIconOverlayManager.LoadNonloadedOverlayIdentifiers
member.summary: Loads any registered overlay identifiers, or handlers, that are not currently loaded.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: IShellIconOverlayManager.OverlayIndexFromImageIndex
member.summary: Finds the index of an overlay image for the specified icon image. It can add an overlay if one is not found for the icon.
member.param: The existing shell image list index to look for.
Whether to add an image if one is not already present.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: An error occurred or the image was not found.

member.name: IShellIconOverlayManager.RefreshOverlayImages
member.summary: Refreshes the overlay cache, the image list, or both.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Determines what to refresh. It can be a bitwise OR one of the following:
Reloads the icons into the image list.
